name: ralphy (michaelshimeles)
description: [项目级] My Ralph Wiggum setup, an autonomous bash script that runs Claude Code, Codex, OpenCode, Cursor agent, Qwen & Droid in a loop until your PRD is complete.。来源: https://github.com/michaelshimeles/ralphy

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
My Ralph Wiggum setup, an autonomous bash script that runs Claude Code, Codex, OpenCode, Cursor agent, Qwen & Droid in a loop until your PRD is complete.

来源: https://github.com/michaelshimeles/ralphy
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 2406
